description: The Mrs. Robinson cocktail is a classic recipe that pairs&nbsp;Aviation gin, pineapple syrup, grapefruit juice, lime juice, Peychaud’s bitters, and prosecco. This twist on the classic uses different ingredients for an even more satisfying experience, perfect for drinking on a&nbsp;summer night on your porch.
